channel.title: Z508-525 npc help please!
channel.description: I was looking through lists of npcs, and npcanimations.. and I found dragons..and dragon animations.. I noticed that my source does not have the correct animations for dragons, only the King Black Dragon.. I was wondering what file you edit, to set NPCanimations.. I looked in all the reasonable places for them to be, but I found nothing.. can someone please tell me?? is it in one of the CFG files, or a .java, and where?

item.title: Z508-525 npc help please!
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

I was looking through lists of npcs, and npcanimations… and I found dragons…and dragon animations… I noticed that my source does not have the correct animations for dragons, only the King Black Dragon… I was wondering what file you edit, to set NPCanimations… I looked in all the reasonable places for them to be, but I found nothing… can someone please tell me?? is it in one of the CFG files, or a .java, and where?
